quotes.quote: I LIKE ads. It's not that we don't like ads, we just don't like ads when they are out of place.
quotes.author: Bill Barnes

quotes.quote: The very first law in advertising is to avoid the concrete promise and cultivate the delightfully vague.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Advertising is the modern substitute for argument; its function is to make the worse appear the better.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: If people aren't going to talk about your product, then it's not good enough.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kalmikoff

quotes.quote: Half the money I spend on advertising is wasted; the trouble is I don't know which half.
quotes.author: John Wanamaker

quotes.quote: Many a small thing has been made large by the right kind of advertising.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can tell the ideals of a nation by its advertisements.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: Chess is as elaborate a waste of human intelligence as you can find outside an advertising agency.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Advertising is a valuable economic factor because it is the cheapest way of selling goods, particularly if the goods are worthless.
quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

quotes.quote: Advertising may be described as the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Advertisements... contain the only truths to be relied on in a newspaper.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I read no newspaper now but Ritchie's, and in that chiefly the advertisements, for they contain the only truths to be relied on in a newspaper.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: What is the difference between unethical and ethical advertising? Unethical advertising uses falsehoods to deceive the public; ethical advertising uses truth to deceive the public.
quotes.author: Vilhjalmur Stefansson
